name: Axion "Saves" The Galaxy
description:
Game made for our final group project for final year of university.

It is a wave based first person shooter, try and get the high score, it gets updated online!.

You play as a civilian mercenary working for the the universal corporation Axion, who needs you to rid the galaxy of a virus infecting its inhabitants. in doing so you get cash which in exchange buys you weapons.

Whats the catch?

It all goes to Axion.

Even though are project may be finished we would love to continue to work on so you can help give your support by playing and giving us feedback!

We hope to get this to Steam!

Credits
